name: financeflow
description: Wealth Management Suite â€” Patrimonio, Investimenti, Budget & Report

scripts.electron: cd client && npx vite build && cd .. && npx electron .
scripts.dist:mac: node -e "const p=require('./package.json');const v=p.version.split('.');v[2]=+v[2]+1;if(+v[2]>=10){v[1]=+v[1]+1;v[2]=0;}p.version=v.join('.');require('fs').writeFileSync('./package.json',JSON.stringify(p,null,2)+'\n');console.log('v'+p.version)" && cd client && npx vite build && cd .. && npx electron-builder --mac && npm run install-app
scripts.dist:win: cd client && npx vite build && cd .. && npx electron-builder --win && npm run copy-win
scripts.dist:all: node -e "const p=require('./package.json');const v=p.version.split('.');v[2]=+v[2]+1;if(+v[2]>=10){v[1]=+v[1]+1;v[2]=0;}p.version=v.join('.');require('fs').writeFileSync('./package.json',JSON.stringify(p,null,2)+'\n');console.log('v'+p.version)" && cd client && npx vite build && cd .. && npx electron-builder --mac --win && npm run install-app && npm run copy-win
scripts.install-app: VER=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && APP=$(ls -d release/mac-arm64/*.app 2>/dev/null || ls -d release/mac/*.app 2>/dev/null) && rm -rf ~/Desktop/FinanceFlow.app && ditto "$APP" ~/Desktop/FinanceFlow.app && codesign --force --deep --sign - ~/Desktop/FinanceFlow.app 2>/dev/null; xattr -cr ~/Desktop/FinanceFlow.app; mkdir -p ~/Desktop/"Le Mie App"/FinanceFlow && rm -f ~/Desktop/"Le Mie App"/FinanceFlow/*.dmg ~/Desktop/"Le Mie App"/FinanceFlow/*.exe && for f in release/FinanceFlow-*-arm64.dmg; do cp "$f" ~/Desktop/"Le Mie App"/FinanceFlow/FinanceFlow_${VER}_arm64.dmg 2>/dev/null; done; for f in release/FinanceFlow-*.dmg; do echo "$f" | grep -q arm64 || cp "$f" ~/Desktop/"Le Mie App"/FinanceFlow/FinanceFlow_${VER}_x64.dmg 2>/dev/null; done; for f in release/"FinanceFlow Setup"*.exe; do cp "$f" ~/Desktop/"Le Mie App"/FinanceFlow/FinanceFlow_${VER}.exe 2>/dev/null; done; rm -rf release/mac-arm64 release/mac; killall Dock 2>/dev/null; true
scripts.copy-win: VER=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && mkdir -p ~/Desktop/"Le Mie App"/FinanceFlow && rm -f ~/Desktop/"Le Mie App"/FinanceFlow/*.exe && for f in release/"FinanceFlow Setup"*.exe; do cp "$f" ~/Desktop/"Le Mie App"/FinanceFlow/FinanceFlow_${VER}.exe 2>/dev/null; done; true
